title: Generate AI Brief
description: Generate a comprehensive brief using AI analysis
customPromptPlaceholder: e.g., Focus on trade agreements and recent developments

errors.title: AI Error
errors.timeout: Generation timed out. Try again with a simpler context.
errors.failed: Brief generation failed. Please try again.
errors.noTarget: Please select an engagement or dossier to generate a brief for.
errors.briefFetchFailed: Brief was generated but could not be retrieved. Please try again.
errors.rateLimitExceeded: Too many requests. Please wait a moment and try again.
errors.spendCapReached: AI usage limit reached. Please contact your administrator.
errors.providerUnavailable: AI service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
errors.modelUnavailable: The AI model is not available. Please try a different request.
errors.generationFailed: Failed to generate content. Please try again.
errors.contextTooLong: The input is too long. Please shorten your request.
errors.contentFiltered: The request was filtered due to content policy. Please revise your input.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to use this feature. Please log in again.
errors.featureDisabled: This AI feature is currently disabled for your organization.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

fallback.title: Manual Brief Entry
fallback.description: AI service is unavailable. You can enter the brief details manually.
